Product title: Toilet Plunger with Holder,Plungers for Bathroom with Holder,Plunger with Cover,Bathroom Decor，Bathroom Accessories，Toilet Bowl Cleaners,Black，Toilet Repair Kits(19inch)
Key Features: Toilet Repair Kits:Powerful Toilet Plunger,Double layer toilet plunger creates an ultra-tight seal around the drain and provides maximum plunging power to clear toilet blockage | Ventilation Plunger Holder: Prevent the plunger from dripping onto the floor after use, and provide quick ventilation to keep the plunger dry. Keep the bathroom clean | Half Hidden Plunger Design:The toilet plunger base can be flipped over,prevent the embarrassment of the plunger being seen, keep the bathroom clean and beautiful | Multifunctional Use： 1: Opening the extension section can be used on the toilet to solve blockage problems 2：Folding the extension section can be used to clear sewer blockage | Installation instructions: The product consists of 3 handle rods, 1 plunger head, and 2 base accessories.Please assemble according to the instructions
comment 1: I was surprised by how practical this plunger is. It comes with its own holder, which makes it much more hygienic and avoids having it lying around the bathroom. The black design looks elegant and discreet, blending nicely with the décor. The size (19 inches) is just right not too big, not too small and it works perfectly for its purposeThe best part is that the base fully covers the plunger, so it’s not visible and doesn’t drip on the floor. It feels sturdy and easy to handle. For the price and quality, I think it’s an excellent purchaseI recommend it if you’re looking for something functional but also stylish for your bathroom. - Susana Leyva
comment 2: The FORASTO toilet plunger arrived quickly and was well-packaged, ensuring it was discreet and ready for use. It's exactly as described – a sturdy, 19-inch black plunger that comes with a convenient holder/cover. This design not only keeps it hygienic but also blends nicely with bathroom decor, unlike typical plungers. Functionality-wise, it's very effective. The suction is powerful, clearing clogs quickly and efficiently, making it a reliable tool for any bathroom. It's a practical and aesthetically pleasing solution for an otherwise unglamorous necessity - javier (Molumba)
comment 3: Good price for the tool that actually works. Happy with the purchase so far - Ngan Barron
comment 4: First let me say I did not know this plunger needed assembly by screwing the 3 parts of the handle together. Seeing I had to assemble it I for sure thought I wasted my money but it is really sturdy and strong. My commode has been clogged half a day so I ordered the plunger and got the same day delivery. I didn’t read the instructions and didn’t realize I needed to pull the end of the plunger out. I plunged the toilet with the end still stuck inside and after only the 2nd time plunging the clog was removed. Due to I just had surgery I was using the plunger with one hand and was barely plunging. So to say that if I was using full force to plunge the clog probably would have been removed on the first try.  Very good plunger get it. - LaToya
comment 5: was really impressed with this plunger. First of all, the handle is sturdy and has a comfortable grip, which makes it easy to use without slipping. The suction power is strong enough to clear tough clogs quickly, and I didn’t have to use too much force. Another detail I love is the holder — it keeps the plunger upright, clean, and discreetly stored in the bathroom, which is a big plus for hygiene. The sleek black design also looks modern and doesn’t clash with the bathroom décor. Overall, it’s both functional and well-designed. Definitely a reliable product to have at home. - Asena tuğçe
